00027 #include "CTSection.h"

00029 namespace CaduneTree {
00030 
00031         Section::Section() {
00032                 mOrigin = Ogre::Vector3::ZERO;
00033                 mGlobalOrigin = Ogre::Vector3::ZERO;
00034                 mOrientation = Ogre::Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00035                 mTexVCoord = 0.0f;
00036         }
00037 
00038         Section::~Section() {
00039 
00040         }
00041 
00042         void Section::create( unsigned int numLobes, float lobeDepth, float radius, unsigned int numVertices ) {
00043                 float angle = 2 * Ogre::Math::PI / numVertices;
00044                 float lobedRadius;
00045                 Ogre::Vector3 localVertex;
00046                 Ogre::Vector3 globalVertex;
00047                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < numVertices; ++i ) {
00048                         lobedRadius = radius * ( 1.0f + lobeDepth * Ogre::Math::Sin( i * numLobes * angle ) );
00049                         localVertex.x = Ogre::Math::Cos( i * angle ) * lobedRadius;
00050                         localVertex.y = 0.0f;
00051                         localVertex.z = Ogre::Math::Sin( i * angle ) * lobedRadius;
00052 
00053                         globalVertex = mOrientation * ( mOrigin + localVertex ) + mGlobalOrigin;
00054                         mGlobalVertices.push_back( globalVertex );
00055                         mNormals.push_back( ( mOrientation * localVertex ).normalisedCopy() );
00056 
00057                         mTexUCoords.push_back( ( float ) i / numVertices );
00058                 }
00059                 // Additional vertex
00060                 mGlobalVertices.push_back( *mGlobalVertices.begin() );
00061                 mNormals.push_back( *mNormals.begin() );
00062                 mTexUCoords.push_back( 1.0f );
00063         }
00064 
00065         void Section::setGlobalOrigin( const Ogre::Vector3& globalOrigin ) {
00066                 mGlobalOrigin = globalOrigin;
00067         }
00068 
00069         void Section::setOrigin( const Ogre::Vector3 &origin ) {
00070                 mOrigin = origin;
00071         }
00072 
00073         void Section::setOrientation( const Ogre::Quaternion& orientation ) {
00074                 mOrientation = orientation;
00075         }
00076 
00077         void Section::setTexVCoord( float v ) {
00078                 mTexVCoord = v;
00079         }
00080 
00081         std::vector< Ogre::Vector3 >* Section::getGlobalVertices() {
00082                 return &mGlobalVertices;
00083         }
00084 
00085         std::vector< Ogre::Vector3 >* Section::getNormals() {
00086                 return &mNormals;
00087         }
00088 
00089         std::vector< float >* Section::getTexUCoords() {
00090                 return &mTexUCoords;
00091         }
00092 
00093         Ogre::Quaternion Section::getOrientation() const {
00094                 return mOrientation;
00095         }
00096 
00097         Ogre::Vector3 Section::getOrigin() const {
00098                 return mOrigin;
00099         }

00101         Ogre::Vector3 Section::getGlobalOrigin() const {
